column2:
This event is to freely change unemployed subsidies for testing and debugging purposes.

If you got here some other way, something has gone terribly wrong, or you are cheating. It's okay, I won't tell anybody!

Which unemployment reform would you like to choose for your nation?

This event is to freely change welfare subsidies for testing and debugging purposes.

If you got here some other way, something has gone terribly wrong, or you are cheating. It's okay, I won't tell anybody!

Which welfare reform would you like to choose for your nation?

The most brilliant and audacious scientists gathered today in $CAPITAL$, at the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ Academy of Science, to oversee the development of our latest and most powerful supercomputer, Deep Thought. The computer was custom-built for a single purpose: to give us The Answer.

Lead Researcher Adams stepped forward to type the question into the computer. He hesitated. Is this an answer that they really want to hear? Millenia of philosophical pondering tossed aside for a machine of wires and plastic? He recalled the epitaph of mathematician David Hilbert: "We must know. We will know."

And with that, he typed it in. "What is The Answer to Life, the Universe, and Everything?"

After a brief moment that felt like an eternity, the computer printed on the screen its reply:
There is an answer. But, I'll have to think about it.

The lauded mathematician turned towards the class.

"Albert Einstein said that compound interest is the most powerful force in the Universe." He raised his finger. "Actually, he probably did not say that, but that doesn't make it any less true."

He turns to the whiteboard. "Exponential growth can quickly reach infinity," he adds, graphing a quickly rising curve, "and its opposite, exponential decay can make even the mightiest number fall to zero." This time, the curve steeply drops until it reaches zero.

"We have, due to recent events, seen such a change in the population of $COUNTRY$. Anybody knows just about how much the population changed?

A student in the back raised their hand. "Yes, Professor."
The population was cut in half.

Earlier this morning, a disturbing message arrived in $CAPITAL$:

"$COUNTRY_ADJ$ cititzens! The nation's going... The nation's going down! No more communications, transmissions of any kind. We'll start again, live in villages! If you receive this, if you survive, then find us... find us!"

Shortly thereafter, we lost contact from several offices and settlements all over $COUNTRY$. We do not know what is happening, nor the origin of the message, but all reports indicate that our nation remains disconnected and shattered once more, and the vast majority of our people are now living in...
